narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Parcare Community Health Network INC is a Specialist provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $88.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $88.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
